sentences.sContent: the long-term effects of the drug
I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.sCn: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.sContent: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.sCn: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.sContent: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.sCn: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.sContent: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.sCn: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.sContent: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.sCn: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.sContent: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.sCn: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

sentences.sContent: ...researchers demonstrated for the first time how this effect occurs in the brain...
...Sasaki knew the first-night effect probably has something to do with how humans evolved...
...he quotes Google co-founder Larry Page to the effect that "the perfect search engine" will understand exactly what I mean and give me back exactly what I want...
...it is this last quality that may have the deepest effect on the way people live...
...No one is claiming the effect of sugar is quite that strong...

...milk or 100% fruit juices haven’t had the intended effect of steering kids away from drinking sugared drinks: the average teen consumes about 300 calories per day — that’s nearly 15% of his daily calories — in sweetened drinks...
...But there are also other areas of impact that researchers have investigated: the effect of sugar on the brain and how liquid calories are interpreted differently by the body than solids...
...There are many examples of the vast harm that is caused when individuals forget or ignore the effect their dishonesty can have...
...The effect was first noted in 1858 by William Farr...
...The effect holds for all causes of death...

...Campus plays a crucial role in educating the young generation and the consciousness of “green campus” will definitely produce a profound effect on students’ various environmental protection activities after their graduation...
...where understanding how an art has created a certain effect is important...

phrases.pCn: 负面影响；负效应；负磁力效应
经济效益，利用效果；经济效应
生效；对…有作用；对…有效果；见效

words.tran: 有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象
有效地，生效地；有力地；实际上
[生理] 效应器；[遗] 效应物；操纵装置

trans.tranOther: a change that is caused by an event, action etc
